subject: Simsonn plus x Not working ingame
description_text:
I am experiencing a serious issue with my SIMSONN Plus X pedals, which I
have not been able to resolve despite extensive troubleshooting.The pedals
are shown as Connected in the SIMSONN software and profiles can be created
and saved. However, the pedals do not output any axis signals to Windows.   In
the Windows game controller test (joy.cpl → SIMSONN Plus X → Test), no axis
movement is shown when pressing throttle or brake — even with high force on
the brake pedal.Because of this, the pedals also do not work in any game.

Pedals are correctly detected in Windows Device Manager as HID devices. SIMSONN
software reinstalled multiple times. New profiles created (no old profiles
loaded). Multiple PC restarts. USB connected directly to motherboard (no
USB hub). Removed all conflicting software (vJoy, Joystick Gremlin,
SimHub). Steam Input disabled. Game reinstalled

Despite this, no axis input reaches Windows at all.It appears that the
pedals show as connected at firmware/software level, but do not send any
input data to the operating system.

Kind regards,

Timo

Hi CuzImTimonti,    PlusX pedals must be calibrated using SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.3. Please do not use the older SimConfigPedals V4 software, as it is not compatible with PlusX pedals.  Also, please ignore the Windows game controller test (joy.cpl). This interface is not applicable for validating PlusX pedal signals. All calibration and testing must be performed inside SIMSONN Manager.  If, after calibration, you can see the blue signal bars moving smoothly from 0% to 100% in SIMSONN Manager when pressing the pedals, this confirms that the hardware is functioning correctly. You only need to bind and calibrate the pedals inside the game.  Please let me know which game you are using. If it is a Steam-based racing title (such as Assetto Corsa or Assetto Corsa Competizione), I can guide you step by step through the in-game setup.

Hi CuzImTimonti,      Launch the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3.    On the “Plus X” control unit, press and hold the “Upgrade” button.    While holding the button, unplug the USB cable from the PC and then plug it back in. The software should detect the device entering “SIMSONN Flasher update mode”.    In the software go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update.    In the file selector choose: pedals‑firmware → pedals‑plusx.sfu.    Click “Start Update” and wait until the firmware is completely written. During this process do not disconnect the USB or close the application.    Once the update is finished (you’ll get a success prompt or the unit will reboot), unplug and re‑plug the USB then test the pedal device to confirm everything works correctly.
